revised_title: Erratum: Solar and Heliospheric Processes from Solar Wind Composition Measurements
tldr: This article provides corrections to an earlier publication on solar and heliospheric processes. The corrections involve adjustments to figures and descriptions related to mass/charge spectra, ion speeds, and velocity distributions of solar wind and interstellar ions. The authors highlight the preferential acceleration of non-thermal pick-up ions and the presence of power law tails in their speed distributions.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Solar Physics
